wikipedia_page.main: Major General Dudley Graham Johnson,  (13 February 1884 – 21 December 1975) was a British Army officer and recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

link_mentions.page: List of English Victoria Cross recipients
response: |Dudley Graham Johnson || British Army || 1918 || First World War || Sambre–Oise Canal
